Acid Stone.name: Acid Stone
Acid Stone.desc: Increases ACID damage by 10% and ACID Resistance by 15%.

Alchemy Stone.name: Alchemy Stone
Alchemy Stone.desc: Increases base Lifesteal by 6% while suffering from a negative STATUS or BLIGHT Effect.

Amber Moonstone.name: Amber Moonstone
Amber Moonstone.desc: When the wearer's Health drops below 35%, all incoming damage is reduced by 25% and wearer becomes immune to Temporary Status Effects.

Atonement Fold.name: Atonement Fold
Atonement Fold.desc: Self-inflicts BLEEDING Status upon the wearer, causing 1.1 BLEED damage per second. Increases Critical Chance by 10%.

Berserker's Crest.name: Berserker's Crest
Berserker's Crest.desc: Increases Melee Charge Speed by 20% and reduces Melee Stamina Cost by 25%.

Bisected Ring.name: Bisected Ring
Bisected Ring.desc: Gain Infinite Stamina. All damage received is increased by 15%.

Blessed Ring.name: Blessed Ring
Blessed Ring.desc: After receiving a benefit from a Relic, gain 2 Stacks of BULWARK for 30s.

Blood Tinged Ring.name: Blood Tinged Ring
Blood Tinged Ring.desc: Gain 2 Health Regeneration per second when within 10m of a BLEEDING entity.

Bridge Warden's Crest.name: Bridge Warden's Crest
Bridge Warden's Crest.desc: Perfect Dodge increases Melee Damage by 15% for 7 seconds. Perfect Evade Flop also gains 10% Damage Reduction for the duration.

Burden of the Audacious.name: Burden of the Audacious
Burden of the Audacious.desc: Decreases all healing by 50%. Perfect Dodges heal for 20% of Max Health.

Burden of the Rebel.name: Burden of the Rebel
Burden of the Rebel.desc: Reduces Skill Cooldowns by 15%, but reduces Relic Use Speed by 25%.

Celerity Stone.name: Celerity Stone
Celerity Stone.desc: Increases Consumable and Relic Use Speed by 20%.

Conservation Seal.name: Conservation Seal
Conservation Seal.desc: For every 10% of Health missing  (Max 50%) gain 5% chance to not consume Relic and 5% increased Relic Efficacy on next use.

Defensive Action Loop.name: Defensive Action Loop
Defensive Action Loop.desc: While reloading, and for 3s after reload completes, incoming damage is reduced by 10%.

Drakestone Pearl.name: Drakestone Pearl
Drakestone Pearl.desc: Enables Stamina Regeneration during Melee Attacks at 20% of the normal rate.

Dran Memento.name: Dran Memento
Dran Memento.desc: Increases Max Stamina by 20 and reduces Encumbrance by 5.

Dran Scavenger Ring.name: Dran Scavenger Ring
Dran Scavenger Ring.desc: Collecting Scrap, Iron, and Ammo pickups regenerates 10% of Max Health and increases all damage dealt by 8% for 30s.

Dread Font.name: Dread Font
Dread Font.desc: Increases Grey Health Regeneration rate by 2 per second.

Dried Clay Ring.name: Dried Clay Ring
Dried Clay Ring.desc: Grants 1 stack of BULWARK. Increases All Damage by 60% of the total Damage Reduction granted by BULWARK stacks

Dying Ember.name: Dying Ember
Dying Ember.desc: Gain 6% of base Melee damage dealt as Lifesteal.

Elevated Ring.name: Elevated Ring
Elevated Ring.desc: Increases Dodge Weight Threshold by 5. Reduces Encumbrance by 5.

Embrace of Sha'Hala.name: Embrace of Sha'Hala
Embrace of Sha'Hala.desc: Wearer gains 5% incoming damage reduction for each Negative Status Effect or Blight they are suffering from. Max 4 stacks.

Encrypted Ring.name: Encrypted Ring
Encrypted Ring.desc: Using a Mod regenerates 20% of Max Health over 10s. Can stack up to 30s.

Endaira's Endless Loop.name: Endaira's Endless Loop
Endaira's Endless Loop.desc: After Sprinting for 2s, the wearer gains 1.5 Health Regeneration per second until they stop Sprinting.

Excess Coil.name: Excess Coil
Excess Coil.desc: Activating a Skill grants a Shield for 25% of Max Health. Cannot stack with itself. Lasts 15s.

Fae Bruiser Ring.name: Fae Bruiser Ring
Fae Bruiser Ring.desc: Dealing Melee damage grants 2 Stack of BULWARK for 15s. Does not stack with itself.

Fae Protector Signet.name: Fae Protector Signet
Fae Protector Signet.desc: Increases Max Health and Stamina by 10 and Reduces Encumbrance by 5.

Fae Shaman Ring.name: Fae Shaman Ring
Fae Shaman Ring.desc: Increases Health Regeneration by 0.35 and Relic Use Speed by 25%.

Fire Stone.name: Fire Stone
Fire Stone.desc: Increases FIRE damage by 10% and FIRE Resistance by 15.

Game Master's Pride.name: Game Master's Pride
Game Master's Pride.desc: Reduces all healing by 50%. Splits all damage and remaining healing evenly amoung all allies wearing this ring.

Generating Band.name: Generating Band
Generating Band.desc: Regenerate 3% of Max Health per second while a Shield is active.

Grounding Stone.name: Grounding Stone
Grounding Stone.desc: Increases SHOCK damage by 10% and SHOCK Resistance by 15.

Guardian's Ring.name: Guardian's Ring
Guardian's Ring.desc: Adds 1 Stack of BULWARK when within 15m of an enemy. Increases to 2 Stacks for 15s after taking Melee damage.

Hardcore Metal Band.name: Hardcore Metal Band
Hardcore Metal Band.desc: Taking damage adds 1 stack of BULWARK which individually falls of after 10s. Max 5 stacks.

Hardened Coil.name: Hardened Coil
Hardened Coil.desc: Reduces all incoming damage by 3% for each 10% of missing Health. Max 15% reduction.

Heart of the Wolf.name: Heart of the Wolf
Heart of the Wolf.desc: Increases Max Stamina by 25 and Movement Speed by 10%.

Low Yield Recovery Ring.name: Low Yield Recovery Ring
Low Yield Recovery Ring.desc: Killing an enemy regenerates 6% Max Health over 6s. Additional kills increase duration by 6s. Max 30s.

Mechanic's Cog.name: Mechanic's Cog
Mechanic's Cog.desc: While carrying an Engineer Heavy Weapon, gain 15% Movement Speed and 1 Stack of BULWARK

Meteorite Shard Ring.name: Meteorite Shard Ring
Meteorite Shard Ring.desc: Increases Encumbrance by 50. Increases Unarmed damage by 50%.

Reaping Stone.name: Reaping Stone
Reaping Stone.desc: After an Elemental Status Effect is removed from wearer, they become immune to all Elemental Status Effects and gain 3% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal for 10s.

Rerouting Cable.name: Rerouting Cable
Rerouting Cable.desc: Gain 5% of Max Health as a SHIELD for 5s after spending 20 Stamina. Accumulation resets after 5s of inaction. Max 50% SHIELD.

Reserve Boosting Gem.name: Reserve Boosting Gem
Reserve Boosting Gem.desc: Increases Health Regeneration by 0.333 per second. 1s after going below 50% Health, increases regeneration value to 2 per second until 50% Health is reached.

Restriction Cord.name: Restriction Cord
Restriction Cord.desc: Restricts the wearer from Healing above 50% of their Max Health and reduces all incoming damage by 15%.

Ring of Crisis.name: Ring of Crisis
Ring of Crisis.desc: When wearer's Health drops below 25%, gain a Shield for 25% of Max Health. Lasts 10s.

Ring of Grace.name: Ring of Grace
Ring of Grace.desc: Taking enemy damage causes 15% of Maximum Health to regenerate over 10s.

Ring of the Forest Spirit.name: Ring of the Forest Spirit
Ring of the Forest Spirit.desc: Relic Healing Effectiveness is increased by 15%.

Ring of the Robust.name: Ring of the Robust
Ring of the Robust.desc: Increases Max Health by 10, and Armor by 20.

Rusted Heirloom.name: Rusted Heirloom
Rusted Heirloom.desc: Grants 2 Stacks of BULWARK below 50% Max HP.

Seal of the Empress.name: Seal of the Empress
Seal of the Empress.desc: Increases Max Health by 20. Reduces Max Stamina by 5.

Soul Guard.name: Soul Guard
Soul Guard.desc: Gain a stack of BULWARK for each active Summon. SPECIFY IN ADVANCED STATS.

Stream Coupler.name: Stream Coupler
Stream Coupler.desc: Using a Skill regenerates 10% of Max Health over 5s.

Tightly Wound Coil.name: Tightly Wound Coil
Tightly Wound Coil.desc: When spending 75% or more of current magazine, gain a SHIELD for 15% of Max Health for 5s. Does not stack with itself.

Vacuum Seal.name: Vacuum Seal
Vacuum Seal.desc: Increases Automatic Pickup Range for Scrap by 150%. Picking up Scrap, Iron, or Ammo grants a SHIELD for 15% of Max Health for 15s Does not stack.

White Glass Bead.name: White Glass Bead
White Glass Bead.desc: Perfect Dodge applies a SHIELD for 15% of Max Health. Lasts 10s. Cannot Stack with itself.

Worn Admiral's Ring.name: Worn Admiral's Ring
Worn Admiral's Ring.desc: All damage received is increased by 200%. All damage dealt is increased by 10%.

A'taerii Booster.name: A'taerii Booster
A'taerii Booster.desc: While carrying a Heavy Weapon, gain 10% Damage and 10% Critical Chance.

Ahanae Crystal.name: Ahanae Crystal
Ahanae Crystal.desc: Deal 5% additional damage for each Status Effect the target is suffering from

Akari War Band.name: Akari War Band
Akari War Band.desc: Perfect Dodges increase Critical Chance by 15% and Critical Damage by 15% for 15s.

Alumni Ring.name: Alumni Ring
Alumni Ring.desc: Increases all Elemental damage dealt by 10%.

Anastasija's Inspiration.name: Anastasija's Inspiration
Anastasija's Inspiration.desc: When receiving healing effects, gain HASTE for 10s.

Archer's Crest.name: Archer's Crest
Archer's Crest.desc: Increases Projectile Speed by 20% and Decreases Weapon Charge Time by 25%.

Assasin's Seal.name: Assasin's Seal
Assasin's Seal.desc: Reduces enemy Awareness Range by 25%. Increases all damage dealt to enemies not targeting wearer by 10%.

Band Band.name: Band Band
Band Band.desc: Increases Speed of Revive and being Revived by 35%. Increases Downed Health and Downed Movement Speed by 100%.

Band of Accord.name: Band of Accord
Band of Accord.desc: Ammo acquired on pickup is increased by 25% per ally also wearing this ring and is shared with other allies.

Black Cat Ring.name: Black Cat Ring
Black Cat Ring.desc: When taking fatal damage, instead of dying, the wearer's Health will drop to 1, and Movement Speed will increase by 25% for 10s. 2m cooldown.

Blackout Ring.name: Blackout Ring
Blackout Ring.desc: After dealing 20% of the Weapon's Total Magazine base damage, increases Reload Speed by 3%. Stacks 5x Cleared on Reload.

Blood Jewel.name: Blood Jewel
Blood Jewel.desc: Charged Melee Attacks apply BLEEDING, dealing 460 BLEED damage over 20s.

Braided Thorns.name: Braided Thorns
Braided Thorns.desc: After killing an enemy, gain 15% increased Critical Chance for 10s.

Burden of the Destroyer.name: Burden of the Destroyer
Burden of the Destroyer.desc: Decreases Ideal Range of all Firearms by 25%. Increases all damage dealt by 15%.

Burden of the Divine.name: Burden of the Divine
Burden of the Divine.desc: All damage dealt by wearer is reduced by 10%. 50% of self healing applies to allies.

Burden of the Follower.name: Burden of the Follower
Burden of the Follower.desc: Reduces Fire Rate by 15%. Increases Mod Power Generation by 50%.

Burden of the Gambler.name: Burden of the Gambler
Burden of the Gambler.desc: Disables Weakspots. Increases Critical Chance by 10% and Critical Damage by 20%.

Burden of the Mariner.name: Burden of the Mariner
Burden of the Mariner.desc: Increases Skill Cooldowns by 25%. Generate 10% additional Mod Power for each Skill on Cooldown.

Burden of the Stargazer.name: Burden of the Stargazer
Burden of the Stargazer.desc: Reduces Skill Cooldowns by 15%. Activating a Skill costs 15% Health.

Burden of the Warlock.name: Burden of the Warlock
Burden of the Warlock.desc: Reduces Mod Power Requirement by 15%. Activating a Mod costs 15% Health as Grey Health. Activation cannot kill wearer.

Captain's Insignia.name: Captain's Insignia
Captain's Insignia.desc: Increases Revive Speed and Relic Consume Speed by 25% per downed or dead ally. Max 2 stacks.

Cataloger's Jewel.name: Cataloger's Jewel
Cataloger's Jewel.desc: Automatically generates 8 Mod Power per second.

Compulsion Loop.name: Compulsion Loop
Compulsion Loop.desc: After killing an enemy, gain 5% Fire Rate and Melee Attack Speed for 7s. Stacks 3x.

Constant Variable Ring.name: Constant Variable Ring
Constant Variable Ring.desc: Increases Ranged damage up to 20% based on current Weapon's Overheat value.

Deceiver's Band.name: Deceiver's Band
Deceiver's Band.desc: After performing a Slide, gain 15% Evade Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 12s.

Dense Silicon Ring.name: Dense Silicon Ring
Dense Silicon Ring.desc: Gain 200% of Health Regenerated as Mod Power.

Devourer Loop.name: Devourer Loop
Devourer Loop.desc: Critical Hits have 1% chance to reset Skill Cooldowns. Can only occur once every 10s. Increases all incoming damage by 10%.

Drzyr Sniper Sigil.name: Drzyr Sniper Sigil
Drzyr Sniper Sigil.desc: Increases the minimum damage at Max Falloff Range from 20% to 40%.

Faelin's Sigil.name: Faelin's Sigil
Faelin's Sigil.desc: Melee Damage generates 10% additional Mod Power.

Faerin's Sigil.name: Faerin's Sigil
Faerin's Sigil.desc: Critical and Weakspot Hits generates 10% additional Mod Power.

Feedback Loop.name: Feedback Loop
Feedback Loop.desc: Perfect Dodge triggers a 3m AOE blast that deal 115 SHOCK Damage and applies OVERLOADED.

Flyweight's Sting.name: Flyweight's Sting
Flyweight's Sting.desc: Increases Melee damage while Armor Encumbrance is below 50. Damage bonus increases with lower Encumbrance, up to 25% at 0 Weight.

Focusing Shard.name: Focusing Shard
Focusing Shard.desc: Reduce Recoil by 50%. Aiming Down Sights gradually reduces Spread by 30% over 3s

Frivolous Band.name: Frivolous Band
Frivolous Band.desc: Increases Evade Speed by 10%. Perfect Evades increase Fire Rate by 10% and Melee Speed by 10% for 10s.

Gunslinger's Ring.name: Gunslinger's Ring
Gunslinger's Ring.desc: Increases Firearm Swap Speed by 30% and Reload Speed by 10%.

Haymaker's Ring.name: Haymaker's Ring
Haymaker's Ring.desc: Increase Melee damage by 0.2% for every 1 points of Armor Encumbrance.

Kinetic Cycle Stone.name: Kinetic Cycle Stone
Kinetic Cycle Stone.desc: Increases Mod and Skill Cast Speed by 20%.

Lodestone Ring.name: Lodestone Ring
Lodestone Ring.desc: Increases all damage dealt against illuminated enemies by 5%.

Metal Driver.name: Metal Driver
Metal Driver.desc: Killing Blows increase Reload Speed by 5% for 7s. Stacks 3x.

Microcompressor.name: Microcompressor
Microcompressor.desc: Reduces Heat Generation when firing weapons that Overheat by -30%. Increases Heat Reduction Rate by 30%.

Momentum Driver.name: Momentum Driver
Momentum Driver.desc: After Sprinting for 2s, Movement Speed is increased by 15% and Stagger Level reduced by 1.

Outcast Ring.name: Outcast Ring
Outcast Ring.desc: Increases Reload Speed by 5% for 15s after reloading. Stacks 5x.

Point Focus Ring.name: Point Focus Ring
Point Focus Ring.desc: Reduces Initial Spread and Recoil by 25%.

Power Complex.name: Power Complex
Power Complex.desc: Increases All Damage dealt by 1% per second to a maximum of 15%. Dodging resets Power Complex to 0%

Power Saver.name: Power Saver
Power Saver.desc: At Max Health, gain a 25% chance to not use a Relic charge.

Propulsion Loop.name: Propulsion Loop
Propulsion Loop.desc: After killing an enemy, increases Movement Speed by 5% and Consumable Use Speed by 10% for 10s. Stacks 3x.

Provisioner Ring.name: Provisioner Ring
Provisioner Ring.desc: Firearms reload over time while stowed.

Ring of Deflection.name: Ring of Deflection
Ring of Deflection.desc: Direct Damage against wearer has a 35% Chance to be converted entirely to Grey Health.

Ring of Diversion.name: Ring of Diversion
Ring of Diversion.desc: Increases invulnerability window while evading and sliding.

Ring of Flawed Beauty.name: Ring of Flawed Beauty
Ring of Flawed Beauty.desc: Ranged Weakspot damage is increased by 25%. Ranged damage is reduced by 15% when failing to hit a Weakspot.

Ring of Omens.name: Ring of Omens
Ring of Omens.desc: Evades cost 15% Max Health as Grey Health instead of Stamina.

Ring of Restocking.name: Ring of Restocking
Ring of Restocking.desc: Reloads within 1.5s of a Critical Hit or Weakspot Kill are 20% faster.

Ring of Retribution.name: Ring of Retribution
Ring of Retribution.desc: Incoming enemy damage increases Reload Speed and all outgoing damage by 10%. Lasts 15s.

Ring of the Damned.name: Ring of the Damned
Ring of the Damned.desc: Increases all damage dealt by 10% while Grey Health is present.

Rock of Anguish.name: Rock of Anguish
Rock of Anguish.desc: Gain 5% Movement Speed and 7.5% Reload Speed for every 25% of Max Health missing.

Sapphire Dreamstone.name: Sapphire Dreamstone
Sapphire Dreamstone.desc: Critical Hits reduce Skill Cooldowns by 3%. Can only happen once every 2s.

Shiny Hog Lure.name: Shiny Hog Lure
Shiny Hog Lure.desc: Reloading grants 25-30 Mod Power to both weapons based on percentage of Magazine reloaded.

Singed Ring.name: Singed Ring
Singed Ring.desc: Increases all damage dealt to BURNING enemies by 10%.

Slayer's Crest.name: Slayer's Crest
Slayer's Crest.desc: Increases Melee damage by 25% when attacking enemies from behind

Soul Link.name: Soul Link
Soul Link.desc: Summons Lifesteal 5% of base damage dealt which returns to the wearer as Health.

Soul Shard.name: Soul Shard
Soul Shard.desc: Increase all damage dealt by 4% for each summon. Max 12%

Stockpile Charger.name: Stockpile Charger
Stockpile Charger.desc: After picking up ammo, increases the damage of that Ammo Type by 13% for 20s.

Stone of Expanse.name: Stone of Expanse
Stone of Expanse.desc: Increases Ranged damage by 12%. Reduces all other damage dealt by 6%.

Stone of Malevolence.name: Stone of Malevolence
Stone of Malevolence.desc: Elemental damage generates 15% additional Mod Power.

Subterfuge Link.name: Subterfuge Link
Subterfuge Link.desc: After killing an enemy, increases the Cast Speed of the next Mod or Skill Cast by 35%. Lasts 15s or until consumed.

Targeting Jewel.name: Targeting Jewel
Targeting Jewel.desc: Increases Range on all Firearms by 4m. Reduces Spread by 15%.

Tarnished Ring.name: Tarnished Ring
Tarnished Ring.desc: Increases damage of Unarmed Attacks by 30%.

Tear of Kaeula.name: Tear of Kaeula
Tear of Kaeula.desc: Increases Relic capacity by 2 while equipped

Tempest Conduit.name: Tempest Conduit
Tempest Conduit.desc: After receiving Elemental Damage, increases all damage dealt by 10% and Resistance to the received Element by 20 for 20s.

Timekeeper's Jewel.name: Timekeeper's Jewel
Timekeeper's Jewel.desc: Increases the duration of all Status Effects applied by wearer. Durations varies per status.

Tomb Dweller's Ring.name: Tomb Dweller's Ring
Tomb Dweller's Ring.desc: Increases Movement Speed by 10% for 10s after Vaulting, Climbing, Leaping, and entering Water, stacks 3x. Reduces Fall Damage by 25%.

Vestige of Power.name: Vestige of Power
Vestige of Power.desc: After 7s of not being damaged, increases Ranged and Melee Damage by 10%.

Wax Sealed Ring.name: Wax Sealed Ring
Wax Sealed Ring.desc: Killing blows increase Ranged and Melee Damage by 4% for 15s. Stacks 3x.

Zania's Malice.name: Zania's Malice
Zania's Malice.desc: Dealing Weakspot damage increases Weakspot damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 3x.

Band of the Fanatic.name: Band of the Fanatic
Band of the Fanatic.desc: Increases Status Effect Damage by 25% and reduces Status Effect Duration by 65%.

Bitter Memento.name: Bitter Memento
Bitter Memento.desc: Sets 1% of wearer's Max Health as Grey Health

Burden of the Departed.name: Burden of the Departed
Burden of the Departed.desc: Reduces Total Relic Charges by 33%. Increases all damage dealt by 10%

Burden of the Sciolist.name: Burden of the Sciolist
Burden of the Sciolist.desc: Reduces Ammo Reserves by 25%. Increases Mod and Skill Damage by 15%.

Crimson Dreamstone.name: Crimson Dreamstone
Crimson Dreamstone.desc: Crit hits increase Skill Damage 1% for 10s. Max stack 15.

Digested Hog Lure.name: Digested Hog Lure
Digested Hog Lure.desc: Reloading increases Mod Damage by 15% for 5s.

Jewel of the Beholden.name: Jewel of the Beholden
Jewel of the Beholden.desc: On Relic Use, increase Mod Damage by 15% for 10s.

Lighthouse Keeper's Ring.name: Lighthouse Keeper's Ring
Lighthouse Keeper's Ring.desc: Automatically generate 3 Mod Power per second for each entity within 10m suffering from a Negative Status Effect. Max 5 stacks.

Offering Stone.name: Offering Stone
Offering Stone.desc: Dealing Ranged Damage increases all Damage by 1% for 1s. Stacks 15x. After killing an enemy, extends the duration to 10s.

Painless Obsidian.name: Painless Obsidian
Painless Obsidian.desc: When Grey Health is present, gain Haste.

Red Ring of Death.name: Red Ring of Death
Red Ring of Death.desc: Duplicates the last damaging Negative Status applied to target. Reduces outgoing Status Effect Damage by 10%.

Ring of the Vain.name: Ring of the Vain
Ring of the Vain.desc: Reduces Invulnerability Window on Evade and Combat Slide by 50%. Increases Movement Speed while aiming by 35%
